```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
bike <- read_excel("SeoulBikeData.xlsx", skip=1, 
                   col_names=c("Date", "BikeCount", "Hour", "Temp", "Humid", "WindSpeed", "Visibility", "DewPointTemp", "SolarRad", "Rainfall", "Snowfall", "Season", "Holiday", "FuncDay"))
bike
```

# Boxplots of Categorical Variables

```{r}
ggplot(bike, aes(x=Season, y=BikeCount)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(bike, aes(x=Holiday, y=BikeCount)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(bike, aes(x=FuncDay, y=BikeCount)) + geom_boxplot()

```
